home.heroTitle: We Coordinate Energy Solutions ‚Äî Not Just Equipment
home.heroText: We connect clients, suppliers and technologies to deliver reliable power, solar and hybrid energy solutions across Europe, Ukraine and Africa.
home.whatWeDoP1: We act as an independent Energy Solutions Coordinator and Project Connector.
home.whatWeDoP2: Our role is to structure energy projects, align technical solutions, source reliable suppliers and coordinate all key parties ‚Äî from initial requirements to delivery support.
home.whatWeDoP3: We do not sell equipment directly. We coordinate energy solutions.
home.powerGenText: Reliable diesel and gas generator solutions for industrial, commercial and remote applications.
home.solarText: PV systems for on-grid, off-grid and hybrid projects, adapted to local conditions.
home.storageText: Battery and BESS solutions for backup, peak shaving and energy independence.
home.hybridText: Integrated solutions combining generators, solar and storage.
home.coordText: Supplier selection, technical alignment and commercial coordination.
home.reqAnalysisText: We clarify technical, operational and regional requirements.
home.solutionDesignText: We define suitable technical concepts and solution options.
home.supplierSourcingText: We identify and verify manufacturers and distributors.
home.coordAlignText: We align technical, commercial and logistical aspects.
home.projectSupportText: We support delivery, documentation and partner communication.
home.marketsWeWorkText: We operate across multiple regions, adapting solutions to local standards, logistics and project conditions.
home.africaText: Off-grid, hybrid systems and complex logistics
home.whyBenefit6: Focus on long-term reliability, not short-term sales
home.useCase1: Backup power solutions for commercial and industrial facilities
home.useCase2: Hybrid energy systems for remote or unstable grids
home.useCase3: Generator and equipment sourcing for infrastructure projects
home.useCase4: Solar and storage coordination for SMEs and agricultural sites
home.ctaFinalText: If you have a project, requirement or idea ‚Äî we are ready to discuss the most suitable and reliable energy solution.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro1: If you have an energy project, sourcing request or coordination need, we are ready to discuss it.
contact.intro2: Please provide basic information about your project, and we will get back to you.
contact.privacyText: and data processing according to GDPR.
contact.directContactText: You can also contact us directly via email or messenger.
contact.regionalNote: Cross-border and international coordination is part of our core expertise.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle1: We operate as an independent Energy Solutions Coordinator and Project Connector, supporting B2B energy projects across Europe, Ukraine and Africa.
about.subtitle2: Our role is to structure complex energy requirements, align suitable technical solutions and coordinate reliable partners ‚Äî without being tied to specific brands or manufacturers.
about.roleTitle: Our Role as Energy Solutions Coordinator
about.roleText1: Modern energy projects often involve multiple stakeholders, technologies and regions. Our role is to act as a neutral coordination layer between clients, suppliers, contractors and logistics partners.
about.roleItem1: Technical solutions match real operational needs
about.roleItem3: Commercial and logistical aspects are aligned
about.roleStatement: We do not sell equipment directly. We coordinate energy solutions.
about.whyText1: In many energy projects, the main risks arise not from technology itself, but from misalignment between requirements, suppliers and execution.
about.whyReduce: By acting as an independent coordinator, we help reduce:
about.whyFocus: Our focus is on reliability, clarity and long-term performance.
about.approachItem5: Adaptation to regional standards and conditions
about.approachItem6: Focus on feasibility and operational reality
about.experienceText1: Our experience is built across multiple regions and project environments ‚Äî from structured European procurement to complex and developing markets.
about.experienceText2: We work with manufacturers, distributors, EPC contractors and local partners to ensure that energy solutions are practical, reliable and suited to real-world conditions.
about.ctaText: If you are looking for a structured and independent coordination partner for your energy project, we are ready to start the conversation.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Below are answers to common questions about how we work, what we do and how to start a cooperation.
faq.q1: What exactly is your role in an energy project?
faq.a1p1: We act as an independent Energy Solutions Coordinator and Project Connector.
faq.a1p2: Our role is to structure the project, align technical solutions, source suitable suppliers and coordinate communication between all involved parties.
faq.a1p3: We do not sell equipment directly.
faq.q2: Do you work with specific brands or manufacturers?
faq.a2p1: No. We operate independently and are not tied to specific brands or manufacturers.
faq.a2p2: This allows us to select solutions based on project requirements rather than product availability.
faq.q3: How can we start working together?
faq.a3p1: The process usually starts with a short discussion of your requirements.
faq.a3p2: You can contact us via the website form or directly by email or messenger. After an initial review, we define the next steps and scope of coordination.
faq.q4: What information do you need from us?
faq.a4p1: At the initial stage, basic information is sufficient:
faq.a4p2: Additional details can be clarified step by step.
faq.q5: In which regions do you operate?
faq.a5p1: We currently coordinate projects across Europe, Ukraine and Africa.
faq.a5p2: Cross-regional and international projects are also possible.
faq.q6: Do you provide installation or EPC services?
faq.a6p1: We do not perform installation ourselves.
faq.a6p2: When required, we coordinate and align suitable EPC contractors or local partners as part of the project.
faq.q7: How are your services structured commercially?
faq.a7p1: Our services are typically structured as coordination, sourcing or consulting engagements.
faq.a7p2: The commercial structure depends on project scope and is defined clearly before starting.
faq.a8: Yes. We often support projects at an early stage by clarifying requirements, comparing solution options and identifying potential risks.
faq.ctaText: If your question is not listed here, feel free to contact us directly.

howWeWork.title: How We Work
howWeWork.introText1: Energy projects require clear structure, coordination and accountability.
howWeWork.introText2: Our role is to organize and manage the coordination process ‚Äî ensuring that all technical, commercial and logistical aspects are aligned from the very beginning.
howWeWork.step1Text1: We start by understanding the technical, operational and regional requirements of the project.
howWeWork.step1Text3: The goal is to avoid assumptions and define clear parameters.
howWeWork.step2Text1: Based on the requirements, we define suitable solution concepts.
howWeWork.step2Text3: We focus on practical and reliable configurations, not theoretical models.
howWeWork.step3Text1: We identify and evaluate suitable manufacturers, distributors and partners.
howWeWork.step4Text1: We coordinate communication between all involved parties.
howWeWork.step4Text3: Our role is to reduce friction and ensure clarity.
howWeWork.step5Text1: We support the project through delivery and handover phases.
howWeWork.step5Item4: transition to operation or EPC teams
howWeWork.formatsIntro: Depending on project needs, we work in different formats:
howWeWork.format1Text: Direct support for ongoing projects requiring supplier coordination.
howWeWork.format2Text: Early-stage analysis and solution design for new projects.
howWeWork.format3Text: Connecting clients with suitable manufacturers and partners.
howWeWork.format4Text: Full coordination engagement from concept to handover.
howWeWork.formatsNote: Each engagement is defined clearly in scope and expectations.
howWeWork.ctaText: A structured process begins with a clear understanding of your needs.

partners.title: Partners
partners.introText1: Reliable energy projects require strong cooperation between multiple stakeholders.
partners.introText2: We work with a network of manufacturers, distributors, contractors and logistics partners to ensure that energy solutions are properly coordinated and executed.
partners.manufacturersText1: We cooperate with equipment manufacturers producing generators, solar components and energy storage systems.
partners.manufacturersText2: Our role is to align technical requirements with manufacturing capabilities and project needs.
partners.distributorsText: We work with regional and international distributors to ensure availability, logistics feasibility and commercial alignment.
partners.epcText: For implementation and installation, we coordinate with EPC companies and technical contractors.
partners.logisticsText: We cooperate with logistics partners to support transportation, customs and delivery coordination, especially for cross-border and remote projects.
partners.localText: In specific regions, we collaborate with local partners who provide on-the-ground support and regional expertise.
partners.principle3: ‚úì alignment on technical and commercial expectations
partners.principle5: ‚úì respect for regional and cultural specifics
partners.becomeText: We are open to cooperation with manufacturers, distributors and project partners who value structured coordination and professional engagement.
partners.formPlaceholderMessage: Tell us about your company and cooperation interests
partners.ctaTitle: Let's Build Reliable Energy Projects Together

projects.title: Projects & Use Cases
projects.subtitle1: Each energy project has its own context, requirements and constraints.
projects.subtitle2: Below are typical project scenarios where we support clients through coordination, sourcing and structured solution design.
projects.case1Context: A commercial facility operating in an area with unstable grid supply.
projects.case1Challenge: Ensuring uninterrupted operations during power outages.
projects.case1Solution: Backup generator system integrated with existing electrical infrastructure.
projects.case1Scope: Requirements analysis, supplier sourcing, technical alignment and delivery support.
projects.case1Outcome: Improved operational reliability and reduced downtime risks.
projects.case2Title: Hybrid Energy System for Remote Site
projects.case2Context: A remote site with limited or no grid access.
projects.case2Challenge: Balancing reliability, fuel consumption and operational costs.
projects.case2Solution: Hybrid system combining solar PV, energy storage and generator backup.
projects.case2Scope: Solution concept, technology matching, supplier coordination and logistics alignment.
projects.case2Outcome: Reliable power supply with reduced fuel dependency.
projects.case3Context: Infrastructure project requiring multiple generators across different locations.
projects.case3Challenge: Coordinating supply, specifications and delivery timelines.
projects.case3Solution: Centralized sourcing and coordination of generator suppliers.
projects.case3Scope: Supplier identification, specification alignment and delivery coordination.
projects.case3Outcome: Simplified procurement process and improved delivery control.
projects.case4Context: Agricultural operation aiming to reduce grid dependency.
projects.case4Challenge: Energy reliability during peak operational periods.
projects.case4Solution: Solar PV system combined with battery storage.
projects.case4Scope: Concept design, supplier matching and coordination with local partners.
projects.case4Outcome: Increased energy autonomy and operational stability.
projects.ctaText: If your project resembles any of these scenarios ‚Äî or presents new challenges ‚Äî we are ready to coordinate the right solution.

servicesIndex.title: Services & Solutions
servicesIndex.introText1: We provide independent coordination and sourcing services for power generation, solar and hybrid energy projects.
servicesIndex.introText2: Our focus is not on selling individual components, but on structuring complete and reliable energy solutions ‚Äî adapted to technical requirements, regional conditions and project goals.
servicesIndex.service1Text: We coordinate generator-based power solutions for industrial, commercial and infrastructure applications ‚Äî including backup, prime and continuous power scenarios.
servicesIndex.service2Text: We coordinate photovoltaic solutions for on-grid, off-grid and hybrid applications, ensuring that system design matches real operating conditions.
servicesIndex.service3Text: We coordinate battery and energy storage solutions for backup power, load balancing and hybrid energy systems.
servicesIndex.service4Text: We coordinate hybrid energy systems combining generators, solar PV and energy storage to ensure reliability, efficiency and operational flexibility.
servicesIndex.service5Text: We act as an independent coordination layer between clients, suppliers, contractors and logistics partners.
servicesIndex.service6Text: We connect verified suppliers and manufacturers with suitable B2B clients and projects.
servicesIndex.service7Text: We support early-stage project analysis and feasibility assessment to reduce risks before investment or procurement decisions.
servicesIndex.valueBenefit2: Access to multiple suppliers without bias
servicesIndex.valueBenefit5: Solutions adapted to real conditions, not catalog specs
servicesIndex.ctaText: Tell us about your requirements, and we will help define the most suitable and reliable energy solution.

projectCoordinationPage.title: Project Coordination & Sourcing
projectCoordinationPage.heroSubtitle: We act as an independent coordination layer between clients, suppliers, contractors and logistics partners.
projectCoordinationPage.valueStrong: One structured point of coordination instead of fragmented communication.
projectCoordinationPage.valueText: Managing energy projects across multiple regions and stakeholders creates complexity. We reduce this by:
projectCoordinationPage.value2: Ensuring all parties understand requirements and constraints

supplierMatchingPage.heroSubtitle: We connect verified suppliers and manufacturers with suitable B2B clients and projects.
supplierMatchingPage.deliver1: Partner matching based on capabilities and requirements

supplierMatchingPage.benefitClientsText: Reliable suppliers pre-qualified and suited to your specific needs.

consultingPage.title: Consulting & Feasibility
consultingPage.heroSubtitle: We support early-stage project analysis and feasibility assessment to reduce risks before investment or procurement decisions.
consultingPage.whyText: Early analysis prevents costly mistakes later in the project lifecycle.
consultingPage.whyUnderstand1: Whether your requirements are realistic and achievable
consultingPage.whyUnderstand2: Which solution approach offers the best balance
consultingPage.whyUnderstand3: What risks or challenges you should anticipate
consultingPage.whyUnderstand4: What additional information or partnerships you need

marketsPage.title: Markets & Regions
marketsPage.introText1: Energy projects differ significantly depending on region, infrastructure, regulations and operational conditions.
marketsPage.introText2: We coordinate energy solutions across multiple markets, adapting technical concepts, sourcing strategies and project coordination to local realities.
marketsPage.europeContextText: European energy projects require structured processes, regulatory compliance and transparent procurement.
marketsPage.europeApproach1: compliance with EU standards and documentation
marketsPage.europeApproach4: focus on reliability and lifecycle performance
marketsPage.ukraineContextText: Energy resilience and backup power have become critical across commercial, industrial and public sectors.
marketsPage.ukraineApproach3: alignment with local partners and logistics
marketsPage.ukraineApproach4: focus on reliability under challenging conditions
marketsPage.africaContextText: Many African projects operate in off-grid or unstable grid environments, where reliability and logistics are key.
marketsPage.africaApproach2: hybrid systems combining solar, storage and generators
marketsPage.africaFormat1: full coordination of hybrid energy concepts
marketsPage.crossRegionalText1: Our value lies in connecting regions, suppliers and project requirements.
marketsPage.crossRegionalText2: This allows clients and partners to operate more efficiently across borders.
marketsPage.ctaText: If your project involves multiple regions or challenging environments, we can help coordinate the right energy solution.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: NUMO Energy Solutions ("we", "us", "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
privacy.section2Text: We collect the following types of personal data:
privacy.section2Item1: Name, email address, phone number, company name
privacy.section2Item2: Details you provide about your energy projects or coordination needs
privacy.section2Item3: IP address, browser type, device information
privacy.section2Item4: Session cookies and analytics data (see Cookie Policy)
privacy.section3Text: We process your personal data for the following purposes:
privacy.section3Item1: Responding to your inquiries and contact requests
privacy.section4Text: We process your data based on:
privacy.section5Text: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined above:
privacy.section5Item2: Duration of project + 3 years for legal purposes
privacy.section6Text: We do not sell your personal data. We may share data with trusted partners only when necessary:
privacy.section7Text: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacy.section7Item1: Request a copy of your data
privacy.section7Item5: Receive your data in a structured format
privacy.section7Item6: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
privacy.section8Text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or destruction.
privacy.section9Text: If we transfer data outside the EU/EEA, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place (e.g., Standard Contractual Clauses).
privacy.section10Text: We use cookies to improve website functionality and analytics. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie banner.
privacy.section11Text: For any privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, please contact:
privacy.section12Text: You have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority if you believe your data is not being processed in accordance with GDPR.
privacy.section13Text: We may update this privacy policy periodically. The "Last Updated" date at the top indicates the most recent revision.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.section1Text: This website is operated by NUMO Energy Solutions. By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use.
terms.section2P1: This website serves informational purposes only. It provides information about our energy coordination services, solutions, and project expertise.
terms.section2P2: Information presented on this website does not constitute a binding offer or contractual commitment unless explicitly agreed upon in a separate written agreement.
terms.section3P1: The content on this website, including service descriptions, project examples, and case studies, is for informational purposes only.
terms.section3P2: Binding agreements require separate written confirmation and mutual acceptance of specific terms.
terms.section4P1: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and design, is the property of NUMO Energy Solutions or its content suppliers and is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws.
terms.section4P2: You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content from this website without prior written permission.
terms.section5P1: While we strive to ensure the accuracy and timeliness of information on this website, we make no warranties or representations regarding the completeness, accuracy, or reliability of any content.
terms.section5P2: Technical specifications, service descriptions, and project details are subject to change without notice.
terms.section6P1: NUMO Energy Solutions shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from:
terms.section6Item1: Use or inability to use this website
terms.section6Item2: Reliance on information provided on this website
terms.section6Item3: Errors, omissions, or inaccuracies in content
terms.section6Item4: Unauthorized access to our systems or data
terms.section6P2: This limitation applies to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law.
terms.section7P1: This website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content, privacy practices, or terms of use of external websites.
terms.section7P2: Accessing external links is at your own risk and subject to the terms and conditions of those websites.
terms.section8Text: When using this website, you agree not to:
terms.section8Item1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
terms.section8Item2: Transmit harmful, offensive, or unlawful content through contact forms
terms.section8Item3: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or networks
terms.section8Item4: Interfere with the proper functioning of the website
terms.section8Item5: Collect or harvest data from the website without permission
terms.section9Text: Your use of this website is also governed by our
terms.section9Text2: , which explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with GDPR.
terms.section10P1: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Country/EU Member State - to be specified].
terms.section10P2: Any disputes arising from these terms or use of this website shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of [Jurisdiction - to be specified].
terms.section11P1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this website.
terms.section11P2: Your continued use of the website after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.
terms.section12Text: If any provision of these Terms of Use is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
terms.section13Text: For questions regarding these Terms of Use, please contact:
